## Source: amazon-inspector (5a1d3bd676881934532a2e75fd644e22b2e4f26fb08bde6d48ff6d529de7467d)
The package karem4 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b843a0d849da7453ce803b77a117a501a3b1e4b04eae8222d3b59d48438931cc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karem4' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
